metadata.title: CVE-2023-31484 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
CPAN.pm before 2.35 does not verify TLS certificates when downloadingdistributions over HTTPS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libperl5.26 - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.7
perl - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.7
perl-base - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.7
perl-debug - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.7
perl-modules-5.26 - 5.26.1-6ubuntu0.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: perl package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.26.1-6ubuntu0.7').
